Package ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.solver

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Solver
    This interface defines a solver within ODEToJava.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConstantStepSolver
    A constant stepsize solver.
    EmbErrSolver
    A variable-stepsize solver using an embedded error estimate.
    PropertySolver
    This class contains all the methods and variables required to form a framework for solving the ODE this includes methods for adding, ordering and removing modules from the solver the solve method contains the actual loop for solving the equations
    SdErrSolver
    A variable-stepsize solver using an step-doubling error estimate.
    SolverModule
    This abstract class defines a module for a solver.
    SymmetricVariableStepsizeSolver
    This is an abstract class implements for variable step-size solvers.
    VariableStepsizeSolver
    This is an abstract class that implements variable step-size solvers.
